effect.shortEffect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead. Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.
effect.full: When this Pokémon is at full HP, any hit that would knock it out will instead leave it with 1 HP. Regardless of its current HP, it is also immune to the one-hit KO moves: fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold. If this Pokémon is holding a focus sash, this ability takes precedence and the item will not be consumed.

description.diamond-pearl: The Pokémon is protected against 1-hit KO attacks.
description.platinum: The Pokémon is protected against 1-hit KO attacks.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: It is protected against 1-hit KO attacks.
description.black-white: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.
description.black-2-white-2: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.
description.x-y: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.
description.sun-moon: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
description.sword-shield: It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO moves cannot knock it out, either.
